front.title: •Krayt Dragon Bones
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on table. Each opponent's destiny draw, you do the following: (0) Put top used card in hand; (1) lose 1 Force; (2) activate 1 Force; (3) lose this Effect; (4) retrieve 1 Force; (5) deploy a character for free; (6+) nothing.
front.lore: Tusken Raiders, Jawas and other desert dwellers believe that krayt dragon bones possess mystical powers that can bring good or bad luck.

canceledBy: Taym Dren-garen cancels any result of Krayt Dragon Bones when on Tatooine
